Public Remarks: Experience an abundant of light, inside & out. APERTURE WILL BRING YOU TO A SURPRISINGLY WESTSIDE LIVING STYLE. The building exteriors are inspired by iconic images of stacked timber & responded to the play of light, creating a unique & subtly changing look depending on season, time of day & weather. The floor to ceiling windows of each home are surrounded by frames - like apertures on a camera, that allow each home to receive max sun while minimizing glare, based on its unique positioning relative to the sun thruout the year. EACH LUXURY UNIT FEATURED EXCEPTIONAL LARGE & COMFORTABLE LIVING SPACE. MIELE KITCHEN APPLIANCES & UNIQUE INTERIOR DESIGN WILL MAKE YOUR MODERN LIVING MORE PERFECTLY!
